document.full_text: after cyberattacks crippled the country's top blogging service, livejournal.ru, president dmitri a. medvedev, who has his own livejournal blog, ordered the police to investigate.
document.title: russians riled by attacks on blogging service
lines_and_colors: after cyberattacks crippled the country's top blogging service, livejournal.ru, president dmitri a. medvedev, who has his own livejournal blog, ordered the police to investigate.
